resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/7-1 - Incremental copy from blob to datalake')]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
TableName,
WatermarkValue
FROM
watermarktable
WHERE
TableName = 'JSON files';

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/7-2 - Load JSON to Azure SQL Database')]

dependsOn.activity: GET Azure Key Vault Secret - Success

body.value:
{
  "message" : "This is our dynamic message from our pipeline with @{pipeline().RunId} run ID. This is a part of the task from the 11th module.",
  "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
  "pipelineName": "@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
  "runId": "@{pipeline().RunId}",
  "copyDataActivityName": "CopyData",
  "receiver": "@{pipeline().parameters.receiver}",
  "pipelineStatus": "@{variables('Status')}",
  "ErrorMessage": "@{variables('PipelineError')}"
}

dependsOn.activity: GET Azure Key Vault Secret - Failure
